CustomField.description:
This field stores the description of the form.
For file upload forms you can use these tags in your description: {NumberOfFiles} = The total number of files the user is allowed to upload for the step. {NumberOfFilesAtOnce} = The number of files the user is allowed to upload at one time. {MaxIndividualFileSizeMB} = The maximum file size that the user is allowed to upload. {AllowedExtensions} = The list of file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded. {HeightMinimumPixels} = For images the Minimum Height in Pixels {HeightMaximumPixels} = For images the Maximum Height in Pixels {WidthMinimumPixels} = For images the Minimum Width in Pixels {WidthMaximumPixels} = For images the Maximum Width in Pixels
CustomField.label: Description
